= python =

== install ==
{{{
wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.7.13/Python-2.7.13.tgz
}}}

== pip install -i ==
{{{
sudo pip install pymongo -i https://pypi.douban.com/simple/
}}}

== pip uninstall ==
{{{
sudo pip uninstall pymongo
}}}

== pip list your installed libraries ==
{{{
pip freeze 
}}}
